Sentencas: A standard fuel cell requires hydrogen for operation; however, to achieve near-term applications fuel cells need to use the existing infrastructure and already available fuels such as methane.
Titulo: A microstructure-oriented mathematical model of a direct internal reforming solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: In this respect, solid oxide fuel cells are promising candidates for distributed stationary power generation.
Titulo: A microstructure-oriented mathematical model of a direct internal reforming solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: However, feeding methane directly into the anode is liable to carbon deposition at low temperatures or to cause thermal stress due to the endothermic steam-methane reforming reaction at high temperatures.
Titulo: A microstructure-oriented mathematical model of a direct internal reforming solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: Because of these drawbacks, direct chemical conversion of methane on the Ni-based anode has not been realized in practical applications so far.
Titulo: A microstructure-oriented mathematical model of a direct internal reforming solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: Therefore, numerical modeling plays a vital role to optimize the anode and thereby assure the safe operating condition of the direct reforming process.
Titulo: A microstructure-oriented mathematical model of a direct internal reforming solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: This paper presents experimental and numerical studies on the direct internal reforming solid oxide fuel cell.
Titulo: A microstructure-oriented mathematical model of a direct internal reforming solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: A microstructure-orientated mathematical model of micro-scale transport phenomena, chemical and electrochemical reactions in an anode-supported solid oxide fuel cell is developed.
Titulo: A microstructure-oriented mathematical model of a direct internal reforming solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The model divides a cell-assembly into six computational subdomains to bypass typical numerical artifacts and assure a realistic charge-transfer distribution in the electrodes.
Titulo: A microstructure-oriented mathematical model of a direct internal reforming solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The proposed novel mathematical model positively passed verification with the comparison of the calculated current-voltage characteristics with the experimental ones.
Titulo: A microstructure-oriented mathematical model of a direct internal reforming solid oxide fuel cell
